exceptions.tactic: apply (Derive_n_ext_loc (fun y : R => f y + g y) (fun y : R => Derive_n f n y + Derive_n g n y) n x).
exceptions.exn: In environment f, g : R -> R n : nat x : R H1 : locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) H2 : locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) Unable to unify "Derive_n (fun y : R => f y + g y) n x = Derive_n (fun y : R => Derive_n f n y + Derive_n g n y) n x" with "Derive_n (fun x : R => f x + g x) n x = Derive_n f n x + Derive_n g n x".

original: intros H1 H2. apply (Derive_n_ext_loc (fun y : R => f y + g y) (fun y : R => Derive_n f n y + Derive_n g n y) n x). - intros y H3 k H4. rewrite (Derive_n_ext (fun z : R => f z + g z) (fun z : R => Derive_n f n z + Derive_n g n z) n y). + apply H1. apply H4. + intros z. ring. - intros y H3 k H4. rewrite Derive_n_comp. ring.
